arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How Carlisle United fared at Port Vale
arts.sum: Carlisle United drew 0-0 against Port Vale...so how did we rate the players at Vale Park?

arts.ttl: Carlisle United hold high-flying Port Vale but gap to safety increases
arts.sum: Port Vale 0 Carlisle United 0: Carlisle are now four points adrift of safety despite claiming a well-earned point against promotion-chasing Port Vale.

arts.ttl: Port Vale lose more ground on leaders Walsall after Carlisle stalemate
arts.sum: Second-placed Vale have now failed to win in five matches.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United recall teenage players from loan spells
arts.sum: Carlisle United have recalled teenagers Sam Hetherington and Anton Dudik from loan spells ahead of their festive fixtures.

arts.ttl: Readers nominate their favourite Carlisle United games
arts.sum: If you could relive one Carlisle United game all over again, which one would it be? We asked fans - and here's how they replied.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United bid to kick off frantic festive run positively at Port Vale
arts.sum: Mike Williamson says Carlisle United cannot afford to look beyond the 90 minutes at Port Vale today – even though the Blues’ situation is “extreme”.

arts.ttl: Port Vale boss Moore has his say on Carlisle United
arts.sum: Port Vale's Darren Moore says the gulf in positions between his side and Carlisle United will not affect how he approaches Saturday’s game.

arts.ttl: Promising Carlisle United teenager Hopper joins Penrith on loan
arts.sum: Promising Carlisle United youth team player Dan Hopper has gone out on loan to Penrith.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United's 2024: a stinker of a year at Brunton Park
arts.sum: REVIEW OF THE YEAR: Off-pitch transformation has gone in hand with one of the worst years, football-wise, in Blues history.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United boss on Port Vale family ties - and clash with Valiants
arts.sum: Carlisle United boss Mike Williamson grew up in a Port Vale-supporting household... but is aiming to turn the tables on the Valiants this weekend.
